content.rendered:
Making Cryptocurrency

Accessible

We made trading simple.

Our Values
In The News
Trust and Licenses
Brand Assets

A Crypto Trading Platform For All

CoinSmart has changed the landscape by making cryptocurrency accessible to Canadians with all levels of crypto experience. By offering a simple trading interface, learning tools, and 24/7 client support, we break down the barriers of complex and confusing crypto transactions. The platform features enterprise-grade security, cold storage, and reporting tools for tax and audit purposes.
Get Started

For More

Experienced Investors

CoinSmart offers advanced charting, order book functionality and dedicated SmartReps for our premium traders.

All customers can benefit from our competitive fees and same-day funding.
Get Started

Our Values

At CoinSmart, we prioritize our customers by ensuring safety and security. Our platform is based on these four pillars—Accessibility, Community, Accountability, and Honesty.

Accessibility

We welcome and support all by providing proper tools and education.

Community

We believe in creating a diverse crypto community—for everyone.

Accountability

We are accountable to our customers, community and to each other.

Honesty

We are committed to being open and transparent with our customers.

CoinSmart Updates and Articles

Check out the Latest News.

Blockchain Scalability Techniques: Layer 2

In the previous article, we talked about different layer-1 scalability techniques. If you haven’t already, you can check our article on Layer-1 scalability techniques here. So, today, let’s look at the other side of the equation – layer-2 scalability techniques.

Blockchain Scalability Techniques: Layer 1

The lack of scalability is the biggest obstacle that the blockchain space is facing right now. In this two-parter, we will be looking at the various scalability techniques developers are working on to fix this problem.

What Is Airdrop?

Airdrops can be defined as the process whereby a cryptocurrency company distributes cryptocurrency tokens to the wallets of some users free of charge.

ICO’s (Initial Coin Offerings)

You’re probably familiar with Initial Public Offerings or IPOs, but since we’re in the crypto world let’s explore Initial Coin Offering or ICOs. ICOs are the offering of

Consensus Algorithms Securing Blockchain Transactions

If you only remember one thing about consensus algorithms, remember that they are what make the blockchain network so secure and decentralized.

Read More

Here's How You Can

Get Started with CoinSmart

  • Create an account and get verified in minutes.
  • Access your funds with same-day deposits.
  • Get verified and start trading cryptocurrencies.
Get Started

Made In

Canada

We are proud to be built in Canada. Now with our multiple licenses, we’re open for business in new markets!

 

Canada

OSC - Restricted Dealer Registered

Obtained

Canada

Obtained

USA

Obtained

Estonia

Digital Assets & Wallet Provider License

Obtained

CoinSmart Trust

and Accountability

Nothing is more important when buying and selling crypto than trusting your provider.

We utilize the top custody providers on the planet, keeping you safe and secure by leveraging the power of Bitgo and Fireblocks. 

Cold storage? Check. Safe and secure verifications? You got it. 2FA? Always.

Customers trust CoinSmart.

 

CoinSmart Media

Access All Our Brand Assets

Brand Book

CoinSmart's brand identity—take a look at our distinguishing characteristics. 
Download

One Pager

All you need to know about CoinSmart reduced down to one page.
download

Logos

Logos are fun, that's why we have a couple variations of ours!
Download
Crypto in the palm of your hand. Access your account 24/7.

Download the best crypto trading app today and see how easy it is to buy and sell bitcoin and many other coins through our mobile app.
